description: You can add up to 5 vehicles to your Auto Pay service.

Each vehicle costs Â£10 a year to register with Auto Pay. This will be added to your monthly statement.
You can select a vehicle that is already on your account or add a new one.
You can't add this vehicle - please call us on 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges )
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from London Road User Charging.
This may change - always check if you need to pay to drive within the charging zones.
This vehicle is already on an Auto Pay service and can't be added again. If it is not on your service please call 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges ).
